{{Actor| | type = Monster | name = Peasant | class = Peasant1 | game = Strife | doomednum = 3004 | convid = 6 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:StrifeHumanoid|StrifeHumanoid]]→[[Classes:Peasant|Peasant]]→Peasant1

An average, tan-colored peasant. {| border="0" |- !width=7%|Map!!width=14%|Name!!width=76%|Notes |- | MAP07 || Person || Is surprised that you are there and says that the [[Classes:Programmer|Programmer]] will kill you. |- | MAP19 || Security Complex || Says: ''"This is where you get the plans for the Central Administration."'' |} ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Peasant1 : {{Class|Peasant}} { {{Property|Speed}} 4 }
